data.name: PowerSlave (DOS Classic Edition) Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Enjoy the Original Soundtrack from the 1996 DOS Classic: PowerSlave, composed by Scott Branston and the team at Lobotomy Software.

Includes 18 action-packed Egyptian themed tracks of classic video game music.
Standard MP3 and High Quality FLAC file types are provided.
data.about_the_game:
Enjoy the Original Soundtrack from the 1996 DOS Classic: PowerSlave, composed by Scott Branston and the team at Lobotomy Software.

Includes 18 action-packed Egyptian themed tracks of classic video game music.
Standard MP3 and High Quality FLAC file types are provided.
data.short_description: Free soundtrack from the 1996 DOS Classic, PowerSlave. This is does not include the base game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 64 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 240 MB available space
